request.description:
- create group chat between peers **identifiers**
    

- you need to send list of **identifiers**
    

- or send it as ****json** encoded** list format all accepted
    

- this endpoint will ignore adding ban users to the group if some one block some one this api will ignore even you select this user be added
- set **extra data** if you want
- add identifiers list ofr jsoin encoded string list
- optinal image for the group if you ingore this field **the defaul_group_image.png** will be used
- you can update this image from your S3 console
- this endpoint constrant with your config for max group members
- you cant add your identifier to this list
- at lest 2 members need to create the group!

request.description: set data as map directly to the api

this api you must be admin or (super admin = group creator)

you cant kick super admin!

- member leave group if superAdmin leave the superAdmin will assgin to random user
    

- if all users left the group will automaticlly deleted

- add members by idenitifers remeber you can limit who can add who from your system and pass the list of identifiers to v chat so users can be added
    

- remeber the limit of group members
- identifiers can be list of json or list
- if identifier exists in the group v chat will ignore hem this mean not notifiaction or info message genration

- you need to be admin or super admin to call this api
    

- you cant update super admin role
- you cant update your role alos

- You can get message information
- you can get seen
- and you can get deliver if you change the last param to deliver
- last param can be **seen** or **deliver**
- you can listen for real time update for this endpoin check socket.io collention for more info

- create order room based on the orderId you send
- if you send same order id the same chat will be returned
- (Optinal) you can set **orderTitle** so the chat title will be the prodeuct title
- (Optinal) you can set **orderImage** so the chat image will be the order image
- (Optinal) **orderData** put any valid json data you want so you can get it from get order room info so you can create custom ui for this part in the message page
